name: Infinity (itch) (xmaxer, muchheinz)
description:
Stranded with your crew in space, with a malfunctioning time drive, and it's your responsibility to avert a crisis! Fix the time drive as you get less and less time each time it loops you back.

Controls

WASD to move around, QE to rotate view, F to interact

Music credit

White Bat Audio: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_6hQy4elsyHhCOskZo0U5g
